H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H3383.def: = river; ◄ flowing from Mount {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>} in a southerly direction through the {L:Sea of Galilee<SDBH:כִּנֶּרֶת>} into the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H4136.def: = relational linking an event to a location right in front of another location

H5489.def: meaning unsure; probably: = a reed-like plant, which grows in water and reaches a height of up to 3 m high; its fuzzy brown seed head becomes fluffy and blows away in the wind; ◄ Typha genus; ► used for baskets and mats; its roots are edible

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H6290.def: = desert; ◄ located south of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, west of {L:Edom<SDBH:אֱדֹום>} and north of {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} desert

H8603.def: = location; ◄ in {L:the Arabah<SDBH:עֲרָבָה>}; ► not far from the place where {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} repeated the law

H3837.def: = state in which objects are white in color

H2698.def: = location ◄ in {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, between {L:Kibroth-Hattaavah<SDBH:קִבְרֹות הַתַּאֲוָה>} and {L:Rithmah<SDBH:רִתְמָה>}; ► place where the {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, not far from the place where {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} repeated the law

H1774.def: = location; ◄ in {L:the Arabah<SDBH:עֲרָבָה>}; ► not far from the place where {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} repeated the law

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2722.def: = a mountain, also known as the mountain of God; ◄ it is located on the {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, ► and known as the place where God appeared to {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} and where later the law was given to {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} on their way to the promised land

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6947.def: = town, also known as {L:En Mishpat<SDBH:עֵין מִשְׁפָּט>} , {L:Kedesh<SDBH:קֶדֶשׁ>}, and {L:Kadesh<SDBH:קָדֵשׁ>}; ◄ located in the Wilderness of {L:Zin<SDBH:צִן>}, in the northern part of {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula; ► {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; it is also the location of the {L:Meribah<SDBH:מְרִיבָה>} spring; spies were sent out into Canaan from this place; it later marked the southern border of the territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H8165.def: = man; ► regarded as founder of an ethnic group bearing the same name, and living in an area named after him as well

H705.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H6249.def: = state in which a countable object is eleven or the eleventh in number

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H2809.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with the purpose of achieving something

H154.def: = town; ◄ {L:Bashan<SDBH:בָּשָׁן>}; ► part of kingdom of {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>}, and later assigned to {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H1316.def: = region; ◄ north-east of the River {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}, ► at one time ruled by king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>}, later assigned to half of the tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H6252.def: = town, possibly to be identified with {L:Beeshterah<SDBH:בְּעֶשְׁתְּרָה>}, {L:Ashteroth-Karnaim<SDBH:עַשְׁתְּרֹת קַרְנַיִם>} and {L:Karnaim<SDBH:קַרְנַיִם>}; ◄ territory of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, east of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; ► former residence of king {L:Sihon<SDBH:סִיחֹון>} of {L:Heshbon<SDBH:חֶשְׁבֹּון>} and king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>} of {L:Bashan<SDBH:בָּשָׁן>}; conquered by {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; assigned to clan of {L:Gershon<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁון>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H3383.def: = river; ◄ flowing from Mount {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>} in a southerly direction through the {L:Sea of Galilee<SDBH:כִּנֶּרֶת>} into the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H2974.def: = to be and/or behave like one with little insight, education or wisdom; ≈ pejorative (see the related term {L:אִוֶּלֶת<SDBH:אִוֶּלֶת>})

H874.def: = action by which some content is expressed in words or written in such a way that it may be simple to understand

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5265.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from another object into which it had been inserted or attached in a different way

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H8219.def: literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the {L:hill-country<SDBH:הַר>} and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill-country; known for its {L:olive trees<SDBH:זַיִת>} and {L:sycamore trees<SDBH:שִׁקְמָה>}

H5045.def: =  an area of land located in the south of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples - initially by the Canaanites in {L:Arad<SDBH:עֲרָד>} and the {L:Amelekites<SDBH:עֲמָלֵקִי>}, later, the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3669.def: = descendant of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>} and inhabitant of the country named after them

H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6578.def: = river, usually identified with the Euphrates; ◄ running through Mesopotamia; ► one of the four rivers flowing from the garden of {L:Eden<SDBH:עֵדֶן>}

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H85.def: = man, also known as {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H3327.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>} and {L:Sarah<SDBH:שָׂרָה>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>} and {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3556.def: = celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H7379.def: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

24.gl: to place (in a position) > to appoint

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2296.def: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H1951.def: = state in which someone considers a certain event not difficult to perform

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3898.def: = action by which humans ingest food

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

glosses: to hurt one's foot (on something) > to hurt oneself
H5062.def: = process by which a human's foot or both feet come in forcible contact with a stone or other object while travelling, ► which may result in stumbling and injury; ≈ usually used in a figurative way to denote sustaining any kind of hardship in life

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4784.def: = action by which humans reject the authority of a ruler or deity to which they had formerly been subjected

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2102.def: = process by which a food substance is caused to be cooked; ◄ by heating it in a pan with water for a prolonged time ► in order to make it ready, or more palatable, for human consumption

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7122.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H7291.def: = action by which humans go behind (other) humans or animals, usually at an increased speed

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H1682.def: = flying insect that collects nectar from flowers and converts it into honey; lives in swarms made up of many thousands of insects; stings only when threatened; ≈ with connotations ranging from positive (food producing) to negative (as a metaphor for an army of well-organized enemies

H3807.def: = causative action by which humans use excessive power to break an object into little pieces

H8165.def: = man; ► regarded as founder of an ethnic group bearing the same name, and living in an area named after him as well

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H238.def: = to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H6946.def: = man employed to have sexual intercourse with other people as part of local fertility rites; ► forbidden under Mosaic law

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
